review: For 35 bucks this is a must have for your TV, use your smart phone or tablet as a remote for Netflix of Hulu.  Mirror Chrome Tabs.  Try it, you will not regret,
author: The Dawg

review: very neat and works great and easy to set-up
author: rlp review

review: I've ordered four of these; two for me and two for my friend. I might order another one for another TV. We cast Netflix and YouTube videos to watch on a flat screen vs watching on our phone, tablet or computer.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I love this product. Simple to use, with little equipment to figure out, and install.... It provides great fun, especially for the price.
author: Richard De Jesus

review: Nice little device that allows me to project my laptop screen to the tv.
author: rowena

review: Good transaction.  Fast delivery.Chromecast freezes every now and then but can't beat it for the price.
author: Todd Campbell

review: Great item.  Makes streaming to my TV very easy.
author: Squirrel Productions
